meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Hurt Lindsey Love Kerry Greene Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7044.

td.p: Chris Hurt, an actor and grants analyst from New York, New York
Lindsey Love, an academic program coordinator from Eden, New York
Kerry Greene, a volunteer guardian ad litem from Manchester, New Hampshire (whose 6-day cash winnings total $146,598)

tr.td: "L"ITERATURE
BARTENDING GLOSSARY
WHERE THE DEVIL?!
LIFESTYLES
DOUBLE TALK
THEIR TV ROLES THEN & NOW

$12,301
The Elements of Style')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
